While help is on the way, I can guide you through what to do next. Are you in a safe location?";}// Reporting unclaimed bodies
if(lowerMessage.includes('dead')||lowerMessage.includes('body')||lowerMessage.includes('found')){return"I understand this is a difficult situation. First, please stay calm. if(lowerMessage.includes('alive')||lowerMessage.includes('breathing')||lowerMessage.includes('conscious')){return"If the person is alive but in need of help, please call emergency services (100) right away. Stay with them if it's safe to do so. Can you tell me more about their condition?";}// Emotional support
if(lowerMessage.includes('scared')||lowerMessage.includes('afraid')||lowerMessage.includes('nervous')){return"It's completely normal to feel this way. You're doing the right thing by seeking help. Take a deep breath. I'm here to support you. Would you like me to guide you through what to do next?";}// Location specific
if(lowerMessage.includes('location')||lowerMessage.includes('place')||lowerMessage.includes('where')){return"Please provide the location details if it's safe to do so. This will help emergency services respond quickly. Are you able to share the address or nearby landmarks?";}// Time related
if(lowerMessage.includes('when')||lowerMessage.includes('time')||lowerMessage.includes('duration')){return"Time is crucial in emergency situations. Please call emergency services (100) immediately. While help is on the way, I can guide you through what to do next.";}// General information
if(lowerMessage.includes('what')||lowerMessage.includes('how')||lowerMessage.includes('where')){return"I can help you with information about reporting unclaimed bodies, emergency procedures, and support resources. What specific information are you looking for?";}// Safety check
if(lowerMessage.includes('safe')||lowerMessage.includes('danger')||lowerMessage.includes('risk')){return"Your safety is the top priority. If you feel unsafe, please move to a safe location and call emergency services (100). Would you like me to guide you through safety procedures?";}// Support resources
if(lowerMessage.includes('support')||lowerMessage.includes('help')||lowerMessage.includes('resource')){return"We have several support resources available. You can call our 24/7 helpline at 100, or visit our website for more information. Would you like specific details about any of these resources?";}// Default response
return"I'm here to help you through this situation. Please let me know what you're seeing or experiencing, and I'll guide you through the next steps. Remember, you're not alone in this.";};const handleSendMessage=async()=>{if(!inputMessage.trim())return;// Add user message
setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{type:'user',text:inputMessage,timestamp:new Date()}]);setIsLoading(true);try{// Get response using our local function
const response=getResponse(inputMessage);// Add a small delay to make the conversation feel more natural
